button_close_market: Close all contract sets in market
error_email_exists: That email address is already in use. Try another one.
error_insufficient_funds: You cannot afford this transaction (Prices might have changed while it was being processed)
error_unable_to_create_user: There was a problem creating the user. Try again later.
error_username_exists: That username is already in use. Try another one.
form_freeze_amount: Amount per share to freeze when shorting
init_admin_data: Generate some markets and users to play around with
settle_incorrect_sum_warning: The final prices sum up to %s, not 100.
text_email_sent: We sent you a message! Please check your Email.
text_explain_cash: The amount of "money" you have available
text_explain_frozen_assets: Assets being held as security by the bank after short-selling. Will be paid back when you buy back contracts or when the market is settled.
text_explain_net_worth: Total worth of your cash and stock assets
text_explain_ranking: Your current ranking based on your net worth given the current prices.
text_filter_portfolio_only: Only contracts in which I own stock
text_leaderboard_intro: Ranking based on the current prediction. The final ranking will be calculated when all contracts are settled
text_no_contracts: This market currently has no contracts available for trading
text_not_translated: Oops! Seems we forgot to translate this text. Please let us know
text_to_strict_filter: There are no matches to your filter
tooltip_price_history_buy:
Bought %s shares at %s (avg)
Total cost %s
Worth %s now
tooltip_price_history_sell:
Sold %s shares at %s (avg)

welcome_admin_text: There are no users and no data defined. You will need to create an administrator user. Please fill out the fields below to create the first administrator user.
